channel.title: Getting other people on
channel.description: I decided to make a server and ive gone through all the steps on the server tutorial i can easily get on the server but when my friend tries to get on he never can could any 1 help me?

item.title: Getting other people on
item.dc:creator: @r1ch13oy r1ch13oy
item.description:
@r1ch13oy wrote:

ya forgot to mention that. but theres a tutorial in the tutorial list for all these things.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting other people on
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

if your username and password dosnt work as what r1ch13oy gave then go to your router and hold down the reset button (little round one in back) for 30 seconds and it resets its to factory default

Read full topic

item.title: Getting other people on
item.dc:creator: @r1ch13oy r1ch13oy
item.description:
@r1ch13oy wrote:

if you have linkseys for a router. go to cmd(go to run under start menu and look up cmd) then type in ur cmd ipconfig it will tell you your default gateway type that into ur internet. when ur at ur linkseys thing it will pop up with a username and pass thing no username but the pass is admin at default so unless someone changed it the username is blank and the pass is admin. once ur there go to the restrictions and gaming. add one, you need to put 43594 as the ports and have it checked. have the ip as w.e ur computer that runs the server ip. hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting other people on
item.dc:creator: @k0_arch3rs k0 arch3rs
item.description:
@k0_arch3rs wrote:

could you link me to how to port forward plz? and for the 43594 thing should i make it be my gate way ip or my ip adress?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting other people on
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

if you are having trouble its could be a couple things the couple most likely that it could be is, you didn’t port forward correctly, you don’t have the right no-ip, or the set ip on the client (if you have one) is not correctly set.

Read full topic
